title: Understanding Schizophrenia Treatment
text: Schizophrenia is a complex mental health disorder that requires a comprehensive treatment approach. Consider the different aspects of managing this condition.

title: Components of Treatment
text: Think about the various components involved in treating schizophrenia. This may include medication, therapy, and ongoing management.

hintAnswer: ongoing assessment and management of active symptoms and how they manifest and impair daily functioning
title: Identifying the Correct Treatment Option
text: Which of the following options best describes the treatment approach for schizophrenia?
choices: the disease is most visible and clients exhibit both the positive and negative symptoms of psychosis
a quieting of the symptoms, a diminishing of the active symptoms or “clearing,” and more clarity of thought
ongoing assessment and management of active symptoms and how they manifest and impair daily functioning
